metadata.title: CVE-2020-5408 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Spring Security versions 5.3.x prior to 5.3.2, 5.2.x prior to 5.2.4, 5.1.xprior to 5.1.10, 5.0.x prior to 5.0.16 and 4.2.x prior to 4.2.16 use afixed null initialization vector with CBC Mode in the implementation of thequeryable text encryptor. A malicious user with access to the data that hasbeen encrypted using such an encryptor may be able to derive theunencrypted values using a dictionary attack.

criterions.comment: libspring-security-2.0-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
